key.name: modifier-key
key.summary: Modifier key to enable mousewheel zooming
key.description: This list is the modifier to be used in conjunction with the mousewheel for zooming. Possible values are 'alt', 'ctrl', 'shift'.

key.name: super-key
key.summary: Whether to include super key in modifier
key.description: If this is checked, the super key must be pressed in addition to whatever other modifier key is used.
